Join us in the cultural hearth of Europe

Drupal Dev Days
column5: the developer-oriented international event that offers opportunities for learning and actually using Drupal
column6:
comes to Italy for the very first time. Browse this website to find out why you should be looking forward to next June…

$

title: Featured second
column7:
Social activities

Drupal Dev Days are an annual conference where Drupal developers gather to discuss and present topics technically relevant to the Drupal community. This is going to be fun
column8: less than a year after Drupal 8 was released… Also
column10: intensive coding sessions devoted to squashing bugs
column12: start and/or complete development tasks. Oh
column14: you get to hang out with some smart people
column15:
too!

$

title: Featured third
body:
$

Become a sponsor

Sponsoring an event like Drupal Dev Days gives direct
column5: front-facing access to the technologically affluent conference attendance
column6: and also means exposure through social media to the vast Drupal community. But mostly
column7:
it’s a way to help the community to build itself upon this kind of events. Learn how you can become a sponsor.

contact us
